EmailTemplate.name: 2023 - Singlewides (GA)
EmailTemplate.subject: Portable Construction office for {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi! Do you need a portable construction office for an upcoming project?
We have a variety of high quality affordable inventory ready to go when you are ready to start your project.
12' x 56' | 670 sq. ft. - two offices, a meeting area, and a restroom 12' x 46' | 550 sq. ft. - one office, a meeting area, and a restroom 10' x 36' | 330 sq. ft. - one office, a meeting area, and a restroom
Get more information...
﻿ ﻿> Request A Quote on our website (https://www.boxxmodular.com/quote-request) ﻿ ﻿> Reply to this email ﻿ ﻿> Call your local expert directly at 770-503-1011
Looking for a larger office building? We can help. Choose what you need from a variety of standard office complex options (https://www.boxxmodular.com/offices/).
Get your office ready for operation with our Building Add-ons, including furniture, steps, awnings, and more (https://www.boxxmodular.com/add-ons/).
Our desire is to help you be successful with your projects. We are here to help!
